snippet: The event is aiming to increase its appeal by scheduling presentations that the organizers hope will make news rather than plow familiar ground.
lead_paragraph: The event is aiming to increase its appeal by scheduling presentations that the organizers hope will make news rather than plow familiar ground.

headline.main: A Bigger, More Ambitious Advertising Week Is Set to Begin
